metadata.title: CVE-2017-17942 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In LibTIFF 4.0.9, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function PackBitsEncode in tif_packbits.c.

notes.note: mdeslaur> probably a dupe of CVE-2016-5319 as of 2021-02-24, no upstream fix

criterions.comment: tiff package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7-1').
